summary: Provides a GPU‑accelerated implementation of the Compressed Sparse Row (CSR) matrix format, supporting creation from dense arrays, other sparse types, or explicit CSR data, and offering efficient arithmetic, indexing, and conversion operations.
business_intent: Facilitate high‑performance sparse linear algebra on CUDA‑enabled hardware, allowing users to store large sparse matrices compactly and perform fast computations within the CuPy ecosystem, mirroring SciPy’s CSR functionality.
